amendment.description: To include certain additional Members of Congress among the congressional intelligence committees, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3896 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3896 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S10342-10344; text: CR S10343-10344) To include certain additional Members of Congress among the congressional intelligence committees, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3896 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3896 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist.
